capabilities.name: CHOWN
capabilities.description: Bind9 is able to chown files.

capabilities.name: FOWNER
capabilities.description: Bind9 is able to bypass permission checks for it's sub-processes.

capabilities.name: DAC_OVERRIDE
capabilities.description: Bind9 is able to bypass permission checks.

capabilities.name: SETGID
capabilities.description: Bind9 is able to set group ID for it's sub-processes.

capabilities.name: SETUID
capabilities.description: Bind9 is able to set user ID for it's sub-processes.

capabilities.name: SETFCAP
capabilities.description: Bind9 is able to set file capabilities.

capabilities.name: SETPCAP
capabilities.description: Bind9 is able to set process capabilities.

capabilities.name: NET_ADMIN
capabilities.description: Bind9 is able to perform various network-related operations.

capabilities.name: NET_BIND_SERVICE
capabilities.description: Bind9 is able to bind to a privileged port.

capabilities.name: NET_RAW
capabilities.description: Bind9 is able to use raw sockets.

capabilities.name: KILL
capabilities.description: Bind9 is able to kill processes.

attrs.label: hostPath
attrs.description: Path inside the container the storage is mounted
